meanings.sent1: The hiccupy baby kept everyone awake at night.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that certain foods can be hiccupy for some people.
meanings.sent3: The hiccupy kitten startled itself every time it hiccuped.
meanings.sent4: The hiccupy engine of the old car sputtered and coughed.
meanings.sent5: The hiccupy sound of the broken clock echoed through the room.

meanings.sent1: The fizzy drink had a hiccupy effect on her.
meanings.sent2: The spicy food was known to be hiccupy for many diners.
meanings.sent3: The hiccupy dance routine made everyone giggle.
meanings.sent4: The hiccupy road caused the car to jolt and bounce.
meanings.sent5: The hiccupy motion of the boat made her feel queasy.
